title: E-Commerce Product Page
description: An e-commerce platform built with MERN stack that allows users to browse products, add them to the cart, and checkout with Stripe integration.

title: Task Management App
description: A task management application to track your daily tasks and projects with features like reminders, deadlines, and priority settings.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my work, skills, and contact information.Features a responsive design, smooth animations, and a blog section to share articles and insights Built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS.

title: Coffee Shop
description: A modern coffee shop web application built using React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include a responsive design, user authentication, menu display, order management, and a seamless checkout process.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A fully responsive Netflix clone built using React, tailwindcss, and TMDB API. It features movie listings and search functionality.Built to provide a seamless viewing experience with support for personalized profiles and content recommendations.

title: Apple Website Clone
description: A visually stunning clone of the Apple website built using modern web technologies. Features include a responsive design, product showcase, smooth animations, and a cart system that mimics the look and feel of the original Apple site.
